feature.label: KNIME Personal Productivity Tools
feature.description: This feature contains the KNIME Personal Productivity Tools including features such as MetaNode and WrappedNode sharing, Workflow Difference Viewer, "Call Local Workflow" node and an enhanced batch executor.
